title: Uncut Gems
description: A New York jeweler tries to find a way to pay his creditors and make peace with his family. But he can't resist when he sees a chance to make big money and ends up getting caught in a spiral of risks and money.

title: 50 First Dates
description: A womanizer who doesn't believe in love falls for a woman with short-term amnesia who forgets everything each morning when she wakes up.

title: Just Go with It
description: A plastic surgeon convinces his assistant to pretend to be his wife to deceive his young girlfriend, but ends up falling in love with her.

title: Hustle
description: A basketball scout decides to take an amateur Spanish phenom to the US and turn him into an NBA star.

title: Happy Gilmore
description: A failed hockey player discovers his talent for golf and decides to enter a tournament to earn money and save his grandmother's house.

title: Grown Ups
description: Five childhood friends reunite after their youth basketball coach's funeral. They decide to spend the July 4th holiday weekend with their families at a lake house where they celebrated the championship years ago.

id: You Don't Mess With The Zohan
title: You Don't Mess with the Zohan
description: An Israeli secret agent fakes his own death to fulfill his dream of becoming a hairstylist in New York, but continues to get involved in international troubles.

title: Click
description: An overworked architect finds a universal remote control that allows him to fast-forward through the boring parts of his life. But he soon discovers he can't go back.

title: Jack and Jill
description: Jack is a successful advertising executive living in Los Angeles with his wife and children. Every year he dreads the visit from his twin sister Jill, who always causes problems.

title: Hotel Transylvania
description: Hotel Transylvania is a five-star resort where monsters and their families can live freely without humans to bother them. A special weekend brings together several famous guests to celebrate Dracula's daughter's 118th birthday.

title: Hubie Halloween
description: Hubie Dubois, a guy who's not very popular, but despite being bullied and being a scaredy-cat, he has a good heart and tries his best to ensure everyone's safety on Halloween in Salem.

title: Murder Mystery
description: A New York cop and his wife go to Europe to revitalize their marriage, but end up being accused of murdering an elderly billionaire and must flee.

title: Happy Gilmore 2
description: Happy Gilmore is back to help his family once again, and overcome his traumas.

title: Big Daddy
description: A slacker who raises a child to impress his girlfriend ends up bonding with the kid and learning about responsibility.

title: The Ridiculous 6
description: Six brothers separated at birth reunite and must deal with con artists and chaos in search of their father's treasure.

title: Sandy Wexler
description: An eccentric talent agent works to promote artists in Los Angeles, while facing romantic and professional problems.

title: That's My Boy
description: Donny hasn't seen his son Todd in years and decides to move into the young man's house. The boy, about to get married, has to deal with his father's presence, who tries to reconnect family ties and ends up creating various problems with the bride.

title: Little Nicky
description: Satan's son must save the world when his brothers escape from hell and cause chaos on Earth.

id: I Now Pronounce You Chuck and Larry
title: I Now Pronounce You Chuck & Larry
description: Two firefighters pretend to be a gay couple to qualify for domestic partner benefits.

title: Blended
description: Two very different families must coexist when they meet because of an unlikely marriage, causing many mix-ups.

title: The Waterboy
description: A shy young man who works as a waterboy discovers his talent for football and tries to achieve success and love.

title: Mr. Deeds
description: Deeds is very popular in his small town, but after the death of an uncle he had lost contact with, who was also a billionaire mogul, he inherits a fortune and goes to the big city to take over the deceased's company. The media makes a fuss about Deeds' inheritance, and journalist Babe Bennett goes undercover to expose the guy as a country bumpkin she thinks he is.

title: The Week Of
description: Two fathers with opposing ideas for their children's wedding party work hard to survive the chaotic week of preparations for the big day.

title: The Cobbler
description: A lonely cobbler finds a magical relic that enables him to transform into anyone by wearing their shoes.

title: Grown Ups 2
description: Childhood friends reunite and must deal with chaos, children, and family problems during summer vacation.

title: The Meyerowitz Stories
description: A dysfunctional family gathers in New York to celebrate their father's career, and old conflicts resurface between siblings and parents.

title: Anger Management
description: Dave Buznik is generally a peaceful guy who doesn't like confrontations. However, after a fight aboard a plane, he has to go to a therapist to control his aggression and visits Dr. Buddy Rydell, who could use a little therapy himself.

title: Funny People
description: A famous comedian receives a diagnosis of serious illness and begins to reflect on his life, friendship, and romantic relationships.

title: Pixels
description: In search of contact with extraterrestrial beings, humanity sends various images and sounds about its own culture on satellites launched into space. After finding one of these records, an alien race decides to create digital monsters inspired by classic 1980s video games and attempt to conquer Earth. To combat them, a group of game specialists from that era is summoned and tasked with defeating the invaders, thus saving the planet.

title: The Do-Over
description: Two friends fake their deaths to start a new life, but end up getting into dangerous and hilarious adventures.

title: Spaceman
description: An astronaut faces a solitary six-month mission in space. He feels the extreme effects of isolation and suffers from missing his wife. Struggling to stay sane, the man is visited by an alien creature that promises to help him heal his traumas. Together they embark on a journey through the space traveler's mind and anxieties.

title: Reign Over Me
description: Charlie Fineman lost his family in the September 11 terrorist attack and still hasn't recovered. He reunites with Alan Johnson, a former college roommate, and the two rekindle their friendship. Alan is going through a delicate time in his life due to his work responsibilities, but together, the two find strength to face their life problems.

title: Punch-Drunk Love
description: Businessman Barry Egan is a shy man who leads a solitary and quiet life. However, several events occur and change his life, such as falling in love with Lena Leonard. But the romance is threatened when Egan becomes a victim of a blackmailer.

title: Spanglish
description: A woman and her daughter emigrate from Mexico to the United States, seeking a better life. The mother starts working for a family whose patriarch is a famous chef married to an insecure woman, leading to an inevitable clash of cultures.

title: Eight Crazy Nights
description: Davey Stone gets into another mess and ends up behind bars during the holiday season. Goodheartedly, the judge decides to give Davey a chance, and thus he can perform community service, helping a youth basketball referee. However, the task won't be as easy as it seems.

title: Leo
description: After decades trapped in school, Leo the lizard plans to gain his freedom.

title: Monica's Gang
description: Gotcha! Adam Sandler enters Monica's Gang story to explain why Samson was turned into pixels, explaining the premise of the movie Pixels.

title: Hotel Transylvania 2
description: Dracula realizes that his grandson, who is half human, isn't showing his vampire side. Worried, the grandfather enlists the help of his friends to put the boy through special training while Mavis and Johnny are away.

title: Hotel Transylvania 3
description: The family takes a cruise so Dracula can go on vacation and leave his work at Hotel Transylvania for a few days. Everything goes well until Mavis realizes that Dracula has fallen in love with a human who could put them in danger.

title: Hotel Transylvania 4
description: Van Helsing's new invention transforms Drac and friends into humans, and Johnny into a monster. Now, Drac needs to find a way to reverse the spell before the change becomes permanent.

title: Bedtime Stories
description: Skeeter Bronson discovers that the stories he tells his niece and nephew come true. To take advantage of the mysterious phenomenon, Skeeter ends up making several mistakes, and the children's contributions turn his life upside down.

title: Bulletproof
description: A not-so-bright criminal, Archie Moses, works for drug dealer Frank Colton and remains oblivious to the fact that one of his best friends is actually an undercover cop named Jack Carter. After Moses accidentally shoots Carter, the cop tries to recover and then seeks to bring the criminal to testify against Colton.

title: The Wedding Singer
description: Robbie Hart is a frustrated composer who sings at wedding parties. One night he meets Julia Sullivan, a beautiful waitress who did very well on her first day of work. Both are engaged to other people, but fate has a romantic surprise in store for them. Linda, Robbie's fiancée, abandons him at the altar, while Julia discovers that her fiancé is unfaithful. With that, Robbie decides to do everything possible to win over the woman he loves.

title: Going Overboard
description: Shecky Moskowitz, a struggling comedian, gets a job as a waiter on the cruise where the Miss Universe pageant is held. There, he lives in the shadow of the ship's official comedian, Dickie Diamond, who gets all the girls and won't even let Shecky open his shows. However, when Dickie gets locked in the bathroom before a show, Shecky has his big opportunity to present himself to the entertainment world and the women on board.

title: Airheads
description: To achieve the success they so desire, members of a rock band occupy the city's main radio station, demanding that their music be played. But the plan doesn't go as expected, the police get involved, and the situation gets out of control.

title: The Longest Yard
description: Paul Crewe is a former football star who ends up being arrested for drunk driving and goes to Allenville Penitentiary, one of the toughest in the country. There, Paul is tasked by the prison warden to assemble a team of prisoners to play a game against the institution's guards. Paul recruits a cunning businessman to recruit the best inmates, who are promised a chance for revenge in a no-holds-barred showdown.

title: Murder Mystery 2
description: After opening a detective agency, Nick and Audrey Spitz finally get an important case: a billionaire friend is kidnapped on his wedding day.

title: Billy Madison
description: Billy is the irresponsible son of Brian Madison, a hotel chain magnate. He is 27 years old and only thinks about drinking beer, reading men's magazines, and having fun with his foolish friends. The young man hopes to inherit the family fortune, but is shocked to learn that his father has decided that he will get nothing unless he completes high school in 24 weeks. It's a very difficult task, since Bill never made it past first grade. Determined to prove to his father that he is capable, he enrolls in school.
